segments.text: A friend told me might find a room here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'll have a room free next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 12,000 yuan a year , but you can't have visitors live in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Would it be all right to look at the room first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you come back later ? We're right in the middle of dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
